short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get all images on the page and create a slideshow.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Creates a slideshow from all images on the current page.
